Articles.Content:
Landed one of my new Hovercrafts on this Floating Pad I made, the pad is needing some structural fixes but the testing went great and the craft hovers with great precision

![dwXsw6S.png](http://i.imgur.com/dwXsw6S.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2016-03-14T15:16:16Z" title="03/14/2016 03:16  PM" data-short="8 yr">March 14, 2016</time> by castille7**

Nice!

How is the Floating Pad coping with the destructive exhaust of the Hovercraft?

> 
> Nice!
> How is the Floating Pad coping with the destructive exhaust of the Hovercraft?

The exhaust is not showing any disturbance to the pad, it's working out great. At the moment I am trying to find a better way to transport a landing pad next to an island and traveling on the water is not the quickest way to go. A rocket launch with parachutes is looking like a better idea right now.
